title: Greta Hick and the Curse of the Lottery Ticket
description: Alternate cover editions can be found here and here and here. Have you ever wondered what it would be like to win the lottery? Well, Greta Hick does win. In fact, she does not believe it! But winning the lottery does not turn out to be what she thought it would. The story begins in a small seaside town in the south of England. Greta Hick is a very ordinary girl with a few somewhat ordinary friends. School has come to an end and she, along with her friends have the entire summer to look forward to before going to university in September. However things are not always as they seem and when she discovers she is the owner of the winning lottery ticket, everything changes in a matter of days. Strange things begin to happen, so strange in fact that she begins to hear people's thoughts! Laugh, cry, shake your head in disappointment and follow Greta Hick though the madness that comes with winning the lottery.
author: E.D. Lala
